translation.HELP_REPROMPT_MESSAGE: Which line shall I check for delays?
translation.HELP_MESSAGE: You can ask me to check for delays on London Underground, Overground, DLR, or TfL Rail lines. You can also say stop to quit. <break strength="strong" /> %s
translation.GOOD_SERVICE_MESSAGE: There is a good service on %s.
translation.GOOD_SERVICE_ALL_LINES_MESSAGE: There is a good service on all London Underground lines.
translation.REQUEST_ERROR_MESSAGE: Sorry, I'm unable to check for delays at the moment.
translation.UNRECOGNISED_LINE_MESSAGE: Please could you say the name of the line again for me.
translation.UNHANDLED_MESSAGE: Sorry, I didn't quite catch that.
